title: Royal Allegiance (RA eSports) is Looking for D3 + Jungle and Top Starter lineup for OOL
body:
Due to availability of our players and proper consideration the players will be looking step down from the starter position of top and jungle to a Sub on the team. They have very big shoes that need to be filled in.

This team is currently ranked 14th in OOL with sister team being in the top 4. We are looking to also finish the season in top 2 for play off. Even tho top 8 is all that is required.

**We are looking for:**
Players who are wanting and committed to be the starter lineup
Have regular availability through scrims and OOL matches
Have the proper mindset for competitive play and environment (we do look to facilitate your growth from solo queue level of play to competitive style)
Working microphone and headset and also someone who is constantly active in comms
The players we have are respectful and a very nice bunch with their own unique personalities but they take scrims and matches seriously with a hint of humor 
Have to be Diamond 3 and above.

If you are interested than add OP Wow or Wolves for trials

[Website ](http://raesports.webs.com/)
[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/RAeSports/)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/RA_eSports?lang=en)

replies.body: i dont know if these spot are still available but me and my friend are challenger
